meanings.definition: The act or process of producing a shiny or glossy appearance.
meanings.sent1: The sheening of the polished silver caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The car's sheening after the waxing made it look brand new.
meanings.sent3: The sheening of the sun on the water made it look like a sparkling diamond.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a sheening that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sheening of the moonlight on the lake was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The sheening of the diamond was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The sheening of the wet pavement made it look like a mirror.
meanings.sent3: The sheening of the chocolate cake made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The sheening of the starlight on the lake was magical.
meanings.sent5: The sheening of the polished marble floor was dazzling.

meanings.definition: To shine or gleam with a soft luster.
meanings.sent1: The dew on the grass was sheening in the morning light.
meanings.sent2: The freshly waxed car sheening in the sun looked stunning.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyes sheening in the dark gave it an eerie look.
meanings.sent4: The gemstone sheening in the candlelight was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The river sheening under the moonlight was a sight to behold.
